title: Bug 2940 Export Zip: Updating of checkboxes should use busy cursor (1GKWVMA)
description: Bug 2940 Export Zip: Updating of checkboxes should use busy cursor (1GKWVMA) MA (01.10.2001 11:38:21)
OB: The checked state of the table checkboxes does not update immediately when changed.
EB: The checked state of the table checkboxes should update immediately when changed. A busy cursor should be shown during the update process.
SR:
1. Open the Export Zip feature.
2. Check one or multiple checkboxes in the table.
3. Observe the time it takes for the checked state to update and the lack of a busy cursor during this process.
